item.description:
There is a great band playing down the road in Cromwell so I wanted to plan to have dinner. I have a couple of people going with my other group, so I thought I'd invite everyone from this group too.

I know Oyama has great hibachi but I have not tried their sushi. I have heard good things though. Check out their website: http://www.oyamajapanesecuisine.com/ For those that are adventurous enough, I am okay with ordering a bunch of rolls to share if that's something you want to do too.

Try and bring cash if you can to avoid the issue with separate checks.

I will keep everyone posted in terms of how many group members from my other group will be attending. And no-shows will be regarded with the same policy as always. I have to make a reservation, so it looks bad with the restaurant if we say we'll have 15 and only 5 show up.
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation will be in my name, but call or text if you can't find us 716-307-6590

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Sushi (or Hibachi if we choose) dinner at Oyama in Cromwell Sat Nov 10th
